description.en:
Event which is raised before data binding.
    Function takes first argument null and second argument ui.
    Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igSparkline.
    Use ui.dataSource to obtain reference to instance of $.ig.DataSource.
description.jp:
Event which is raised before data binding.
    Function takes first argument null and second argument ui.
    Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igSparkline.
    Use ui.dataSource to obtain reference to instance of $.ig.DataSource.

description.en:
Event which is raised after data binding.
    Function takes first argument null and second argument ui.
    Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igSparkline.
    Use ui.data to obtain reference to array actual data which is displayed by chart.
    Use ui.dataSource to obtain reference to instance of $.ig.DataSource.
description.jp:
Event which is raised after data binding.
    Function takes first argument null and second argument ui.
    Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igSparkline.
    Use ui.data to obtain reference to array actual data which is displayed by chart.
    Use ui.dataSource to obtain reference to instance of $.ig.DataSource.

description.en: The width of the chart. It can be set as a number in pixels, string (px) or percentage (%).
description.jp: The width of the chart. It can be set as a number in pixels, string (px) or percentage (%).

description.en: The height of the chart. It can be set as a number in pixels, string (px) or percentage (%).
description.jp: The height of the chart. It can be set as a number in pixels, string (px) or percentage (%).

description.en: Gets or sets the sparkline brush.
description.jp: Gets or sets the sparkline brush.

description.en: Can be any valid data source accepted by $.ig.DataSource, or an instance of an $.ig.DataSource itself.
description.jp: Can be any valid data source accepted by $.ig.DataSource, or an instance of an $.ig.DataSource itself.

description.en: Gets or sets the position of the normal range on the sparkline.
description.jp: Gets or sets the position of the normal range on the sparkline.

description.en: Gets or sets the display type of the sparkline.
description.jp: Gets or sets the display type of the sparkline.

description.en: Display the sparkline as a line.
description.jp: Display the sparkline as a line.

description.en: Display the sparkline as a filled polygon.
description.jp: Display the sparkline as a filled polygon.

description.en: Display the sparkline as a set of columns.
description.jp: Display the sparkline as a set of columns.

description.en: Display the sparkline as a set of columns on a boolean scale.
description.jp: Display the sparkline as a set of columns on a boolean scale.

description.en: Gets or sets the first marker brush of the sparkline.
description.jp: Gets or sets the first marker brush of the sparkline.

description.en: Gets or sets the first marker size of the sparkline.
description.jp: Gets or sets the first marker size of the sparkline.

description.en: Gets or sets the first marker visibility of the sparkline.
description.jp: Gets or sets the first marker visibility of the sparkline.

description.en: Visualize the first igSparkline marker
description.jp: Visualize the first igSparkline marker

description.en: Collapse the first igSparkline marker
description.jp: Collapse the first igSparkline marker

description.en: Sets or gets a function which takes an object that produces a formatted label for displaying in the chart.
description.jp: Sets or gets a function which takes an object that produces a formatted label for displaying in the chart.

description.jp: Gets or sets the high marker brush of the sparkline.

description.en: Gets or sets the horizontal axis line brush of the sparkline.
description.jp: Gets or sets the horizontal axis line brush of the sparkline.

description.en:
The value or content to display on the horizontal axis.
 This can be set to a formatted string, such as "{0}", or it can be set to a DataTemplate.
description.jp:
The value or content to display on the horizontal axis.
 This can be set to a formatted string, such as "{0}", or it can be set to a DataTemplate.

description.en: Gets or sets the display state of the horizontal axis.
description.jp: Gets or sets the display state of the horizontal axis.

description.en: Visualize the igSparkline horizontal axis
description.jp: Visualize the igSparkline horizontal axis

description.en: Collapse the igSparkline horizontal axis
description.jp: Collapse the igSparkline horizontal axis

description.en: String identifier of a column or property name to get labels from on each item in the data source.  These labels will be retrieved from the first and last item, and displayed by the horizontal axis.
description.jp: String identifier of a column or property name to get labels from on each item in the data source.  These labels will be retrieved from the first and last item, and displayed by the horizontal axis.

description.jp: Trendline is not going to be used by the sparkline

 This can be set to a formatted string, such as "{0:n}", or it can be set to a DataTemplate.
